context.flawed_solution:
#### 5
The volume of the box is 10 x 12 = <<10*12=120>>120 cu in.
The volume of a wooden block is 3 x 2 x 4 = <<3*2*4=24>>24 cu in.
120/24 = <<120/24=5>>5 wooden blocks can fit into the box.
